title:
Numerical semigroups from rational matrices II: matricial dimension does
  not exceed multiplicity
authors: Arsh Chhabra, Stephan Ramon Garcia, Christopher O'Neill
abstract:
We continue our study of exponent semigroups of rational matrices. Our main
result is that the matricial dimension of a numerical semigroup is at most its
multiplicity (the least generator), greatly improving upon the previous upper
bound (the conductor). For many numerical semigroups, including all symmetric
numerical semigroups, our upper bound is tight.
